name: Minimal Raider
description:
"Somewhere in the Great Desert, an ancient tomb awaits an eager adventurer."

Minimal Raider is my homage to the Tomb Raider franchise. It's roughly of the scope  of a challenge tomb from one of the modern games, and it focuses on quiet exploration like the old games did. But watch out for the deadly traps and challenges that can be found throughout... only a skilled adventurer will be able to make it out alive with the treasure.
